name: Boom Brothers
description: Boom Brothers is a team based multiplayer third person shooter with vehicular combat. Customise your soldier's look and talk with teammates and enemies through text to speech chat! Fly fighter and bomber planes, drive tanks and jeeps and fight alongside your friends in Boom Brothers.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4690S @ 3.20GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K 3.50GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
